---
title: "P2P Notebooks"
---

A collection of notebooks analyzing P2P dynamics in Ethereum networks. Currently focused on mainnet.

## Index

**Blobs**

- [Blob inclusion](notebooks/01-blob-inclusion.qmd): Blob inclusion patterns per block and epoch.
- [Blob flow](notebooks/02-blob-flow.qmd): Flow diagrams tracing blob packing per entities, builders, and relays.
- [Column propagation](notebooks/03-column-propagation.qmd): Column propagation timing across 128 data columns subnets.

## Generation

**Frequency: daily at 1am UTC, archiving the last 30 days.**

```
ClickHouse  ──[fetch_data.py]──>  Parquet files  ──[notebooks]──>  Visualizations
                                      │
                                      └── Stored on `data` branch (CI)
                                          or `notebooks/data/` (local dev)
```

## Data sources

- [EthPandaOps](https://ethpandaops.io) Xatu ClickHouse infrastructure.
